attributes.action: Do not make the Covid vaccine mandatory in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the importance of freedom of choice for medical procedures and the devastating impact of vaccines mandates on physical health, the economy and mental health.
attributes.background: To stop any plans for making the Covid vaccine mandatory and to stop it being compulsory for NHS staff and care workers.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not make vaccination against Covid-19 mandatory: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
